pkgmetadata.longdescription: (Robust) Mediation Analysis // Perform mediation analysis via the fast-and-robust bootstrap test ROBMED (Alfons, Ates Groenen, 2022a; doi:10.1177/1094428121999096), as well as various other methods. Details on the implementation and code examples can be found in Alfons, Ates, and Groenen (2022b) doi:10.18637/jss.v103.i13.
